Interface GameEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GuiController
public interface GameEventListener
Interface for receiving game events from the event publisher. Implementations (typically UI controllers) can respond to game state changes.

Listeners receive notifications for:

  • Game initialization
  • Score changes
  • Brick updates
  • Board updates
  • Line clears
  • Game over
  • Brick placement
See Also:
  • GameEventPublisher

    • onGameInitialized

      void onGameInitialized(GameStateSnapshot snapshot)
      Called when the game is initialized with a new state.
      Parameters:
      snapshot - the initial game state

    • onScoreChanged

      void onScoreChanged(ScoreChangeEvent event)
      Called when the score changes.
      Parameters:
      event - the score change event

    • onBrickUpdated

      void onBrickUpdated(ViewData viewData)
      Called when the active brick is updated (moved or rotated).
      Parameters:
      viewData - the updated view data

    • onBoardUpdated

      void onBoardUpdated(int[][] boardMatrix)
      Called when the board state changes (rows cleared or merged).
      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - the updated board matrix

    • onLinesCleared

      void onLinesCleared(ClearRow clearRow)
      Called when one or more lines are cleared.
      Parameters:
      clearRow - the details of cleared rows

      Called when the game is over.
